How to install TopologyTracer
=============================
TopologyTracer utilizes tools to simplify the tracing of simulation data.
   
1. Check your Linux installation for cmake and make
2. Pull the project from the git repository https://github.com/mkuehbach/TopologyTracer
3. Check your compiler. Both the Intel compiler (v14.0 or newer) and the GNU compiler can be utilized
4. Open a console and *cd build*
5. Only once when setting up a new computer *cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release ..*
6. Compile the program with *make*
7. Find happily the binary in *build*
